name: Almond Jelly
author: YELLOWMNM81
summary: This is one of my favorite desserts that I get when I go to a Chinese restaurant. With this recipe, it is easy to make it in the comfort of your own home! Serve with some canned fruit cocktail with syrup or just some fresh fruit! It's such a refreshing dessert to enjoy and a very good change from plain gelatin.
directions: Pour 1 cup water in a bowl; sprinkle the gelatin over the water; stir until the gelatin is partially dissolved
Bring 1 cup water to a boil in a large saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low and slowly pour in the gelatin mixture
Add the milk, sugar, and almond extract; stir until the sugar and gelatin are completely dissolved; pour mixture into a large, shallow container
Cut into small squares to serve
